Reference

All functions

QSIM_prepare_for_tool()

Read Qsim output and save in required format for misa assessment tool

SummerMonths()

Breaking down POSIX into months and year and filter by month

adapt_timestep()

  1. Change of Timesteps

add_constant_values()

  1. Add constant values

adjust_time()

Equal time intervals

aggregate_measurements()

Average data per predefined timesteps

averaging_values()

3a. Integrated function in Change of Timesteps

build_gerris_table()

  1. Reshaping to Gerris format

change_time_format()

  1. Change time to gerris format

check_high_concentration()

Detailed look on concentration over the Gerris limit special functions for more information about concentrations above gerris concentration limit --> see concentrations and the according flow iw_gerris_interace needs to be stopped at "5" to obtain the results table

check_parameter_range()

  1. Checking if the concentration lies within the gerris range

closest_available_outlet()

4a. Find closest outlet to the missing one

continuousTimeIntervals()

Force data into predefined time intervals

correct_flow()

  1. Flow correction

count_def_events()

Count Events of deficits

count_def_hours()

Count hours of deficits

data_per_outlet()

  1. Reshaping from parameter-tables to outlet-tables

find_positions()

  1. small function to help creating a column with gerris outlet ID

finding_o2Column()

finding_o2Column

finding_timestampColumns()

finding_timestampColumns

get_concentrations()

  1. calculating concentration from mass flows

get_cso_stats()

Function to get statatistic per outlet

ids_from_colnames()

ID from column name

integrate_missing_outlets()

  1. Merge outlets that are not defined in Gerris with those that are

interpolate_multipleNA()

Linear interpolation for one or more missing values

iw_gerris_interface()

Convert data from infoworks output to gerris input format

kn_correction()

  1. correction of Kjeldahl Nitrogen

load_berlin_rivers()

Reads package Data containing river courses of Berlin and river sites simulated by the Qsim model

load_infoworks_output()

  1. loading infoworks Output

misa_filter_data()

Filter MiSa Dataframe

misa_prepare_data()

Prepare MiSa Data for MiSa Assessment

negative_deviation()

Relative Negative Deviation from a reference

outletIDs()

Loads the package outlet ID table

Loads the parameter ID table

postText()

Text written and status bar drawn after data process step

preText()
